cms.query.QueryText: SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS## FROM ( SELECT OM_Activity.ActivityID, OM_Activity.ActivityTitle, OM_Activity.ActivityType, OM_Activity.ActivityCreated, OM_Activity.ActivitySiteID, OM_Contact.ContactID, ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactFirstName, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactFirstName,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactMiddleName, '') + CASE WHEN (NULLIF(OM_Contact.ContactMiddleName,'') IS NULL) THEN '' ELSE ' ' END + ISNULL(OM_Contact.ContactLastName, '') AS ContactFullNameJoined FROM OM_Activity LEFT JOIN OM_Contact ON OM_Activity.ActivityContactID = OM_Contact.ContactID ) as tab WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##
